episode_event_halloween_2025/4001_1001_0:
I know! Why don’t we ask
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?

Sorry to bother, but do you know any events
that anyone can join?

See, I was added to a committee that’ll be
hosting an academy event, but I don’t have
any event ideas.

If you know any I could use as reference,
it’d be a huge help!
episode_event_halloween_2025/4001_0401_0:
That’s where costumed sync pairs battle it
out, right?
episode_event_halloween_2025/4001_1001_1:
As they say, it’s best to see something with
your own eyes, so I’ll join in this year!
episode_event_halloween_2025/6801_1031_0:
Today, I’ll become a
new me!
episode_event_halloween_2025/6801_1001_0:
The Midnight Parade is a chance to show off
a different side of yourself!
I’m gonna find a new kind of cute!
episode_event_halloween_2025/4002_1001_0: So this is Pasio’s Midnight Parade!

Everyone’s outfits are so different, just like
the decorations around town. It’s all so cute!
Hehehe! I guess Whimsicott’s having fun, too!

I see. In this event, ghost Pokémon are the
stars of the show!

A lot of folks seem to be going for
“spooky cute” costumes.
Nice to meet you! I’m Lacey!
episode_event_halloween_2025/4002_1001_1:
I’m a student at Blueberry Academy,
but now I attend Pasio Academy, too!

My name’s Sabrina. I’m a Gym Leader from
Kanto. It’s a pleasure to meet you.

Are you joining the Midnight Parade,
Sabrina?

I had a premonition—a feeling that I should
participate.
But I see you’re not wearing costumes.

I’m here to scope out some ideas for an
event we’ll be holding at Pasio Academy.
I see. So you’re not just here for fun.
episode_event_halloween_2025/4002_1001_2:
Looks like you’re not in costume either,
Sabrina.

Understandable! It’s hard to decide with so
many cute choices!

Then why don’t we check out the event
together, since we’re all not in costume?
Thank you. Let’s go together, then.

Time for a battle! If you beat us, we’ll give
you a treat!
episode_event_halloween_2025/4002_1001_3:
I suppose we should, if we want to get the
full experience?
episode_event_halloween_2025/4003_1001_0: Fight or fright was a lot of fun!

We got candy and saw sync pairs in cute
outfits! It was the best!

Indeed. We worked well together in
battle, too.
Something smells nice. Where are we?

Tonight’s event is a social one, where you
can chat with others over some refreshments!
We’ll be your butlers this evening!
episode_event_halloween_2025/4003_1001_1:
So it’s not just about battles! They’re going
above and beyond!

I never would’ve known about this if I
hadn’t come!

The whole point is for guests to relax and
enjoy themselves.

It’d be nice to do something like that for the
academy event!
Oh? Did I hear you mention Pasio Academy?

But if that’s why you’re here, you won’t be
able to enjoy the Midnight Parade, will you?
That’s a shame. Dressing up is fun.

I can’t afford to play around right now.
I have planning to do!
episode_event_halloween_2025/4003_1001_2:
I promise to make the academy event just as
fun and exciting as the Midnight Ball!

Well if there’s any way we can show our
support for your event, just say the word!

My apologies—I have something to
attend to.

By the way, I have a question for you
three butlers!
What can you tell me about tea parties?

When welcoming guests, I first try to imagine
how it feels to be welcomed.

Then I consider what I can do to make them
more comfortable.
episode_event_halloween_2025/4003_1001_3:
To understand hospitality, you have to see
things from your guest’s point of view.

Otherwise, you may come across as
overbearing!
Ah, I see! I’m learning so much!
If you plan to host an event of your own...

perhaps it’d be best to experience this one
as a guest, to see things through their eyes?

No way! That’s...Bellelba, from
“Mystery Doors of the Magical Land”?!

What a high-quality costume! Who in the
world is—
episode_event_halloween_2025/4003_1001_4:
My, my. So you do know me, the queen of
the Land of Enchantment. I’m impressed.

Lacey! [Name:PlayerNickname ]! As a
little treat, I order you to serve me as I
guide you to the Midnight Parade!
Consider it an honor to work for me!

Wow, she’s completely in character!
What a pro!
episode_event_halloween_2025/4004_1001_0:
I’m running low on life energy. Could you be
a darling and bring me a drink of some?

We don’t have anything like that on our
menu! And neither would any other café!
I’ll just extract the life force from YOU!
episode_event_halloween_2025/4004_1001_1:
Er—I mean, Bellelba! We shouldn’t cause
trouble for the staff!

Oh, it’s OK! After all, today’s a day to enjoy
being in costume!
I’ll settle for a normal drink, then.
Phew! Thank you for your order!
episode_event_halloween_2025/4005_1001_0:
My, my. Look at all those adorable little
children.

Excuse me, little ones. I’m positive you can’t
eat all those treats.

So battle me! I’ll take them from you when
I win!
You can’t take candy from little kids!

Hmph! Yeah right! We’ll just take YOUR
candy instead, old lady!
WHAT did you just call me?!

Why so surprised? You battle, and the
winner takes the candy.
episode_event_halloween_2025/4005_1001_1: That’s what the Midnight Parade is all about!

Now shut your mouths and watch me
elegantly pummel these kids!
episode_event_halloween_2025/4006_1001_0:
Argh! I can’t believe I lost to sniveling little
children!
Ahahaha! Yay, we got so much candy!

See ya later, lady! Let’s battle again
sometime!

Rrrrgh! You little scoundrels! I won’t
forget this!

I’m so jealous! I want Bellelba to be mean
to me!
But you were being so selfish and mean.

Today’s special. Today, evildoers are more
popular than heroes.
episode_event_halloween_2025/4006_1001_1:
A goody-two-shoes honor student is simply
boring.

Why not sell your soul for a bit of darkness
and enjoy some evil, harmless fun?
episode_event_halloween_2025/4007_1001_0:
Together with Whimsicott, who loves
mischief...

I’ve decided to show my dark side and be
bad, just for today!

I’ll be devious AND cute, just like Bellelba!
It’ll be fun—for everyone!

I’m not gonna do actual bad things, though!
That’s just not right!

You’ve decided to embrace the
Midnight Parade.
episode_event_halloween_2025/4007_1001_1: Ohohohohoho! Lacey’s fallen to the dark side!
We’ll rule the entire city...with FEAR!
episode_event_halloween_2025/4008_1001_0: The three of us will take you on!
We won’t hold back. Prepare yourselves.
Let’s get this show on the road!
Order up! Let’s start you off with this!

Very good! Show me what a good, loyal
servant you are!
episode_event_halloween_2025/4008_1001_1:
It seems your teamwork was better
than ours!

I’m gonna keep learning more about
having fun!
episode_event_halloween_2025/4009_1001_0: If you win, I’ll give you some candy...

But you’re all so cute! If I win, maybe
I’ll...eat you all up!
Heh! We’ll get right back at you!
I’ll show you my cute side AND my bad!

All eyes on our great big Terastal heart!
Time to get even cuter and badder!
episode_event_halloween_2025/4009_1001_1:
I begged Professor Bellis to let me change
the type we Sync Terastallize into!

Whimsicott likes to play pranks by turning
rooms into cotton-filled messes.
I wanted to show off its cute bad side!

Ohohoho! The seeds of darkness in your
heart are growing!
OK! Let’s go on the attack!
episode_event_halloween_2025/4010_1101_0:
Lacey and Bellelba’s evil alliance continued
for a while...
episode_event_halloween_2025/4011_1001_0: I pitched my idea for the academy event!
I was worried people wouldn’t like my idea.

But surprisingly, its dark twist was well
received! They said it wasn’t like me—
in a good way!

Sabrina, thanks for encouraging me to enjoy
the Midnight Parade!

You’re the one who followed Bellelba’s
advice, Lacey.
episode_event_halloween_2025/4011_1001_1: Sabrina, you’re also cute as you are now!

I don’t get that often. I’m not sure how to
respond...

I was so busy brainstorming ideas during the
Midnight Parade, I didn’t even notice!
How could I miss that?

Are you making fun of me now? Maybe you
are bad after all!
